As Ichigo made his way to school, he was suddenly overcome with dizzyness, and began to fall into a dze as he blacked out.

----------

He suddenly came to, finding himself in a whole new location. Looking around, he immediately recognized it as right outside his own home. "But how did I get back here?" he said with confusion. He left at ten minutes ago before he blacked out.

He then felt a breeze on his legs, as if they were bare, and when he looked down, he was met with shock and horror."What the hell?!" He saw that he was no longer wearing his school uniform. Well actually, it was still the uniform to his school, Just not the boys uniform. He had on the white blouse and gray skirt that he would often see around his school. And even stranger than the fact that he was dressed like this was that it seemed to fit him perfectly.

As he stared at what had happened to his wardrobe, he heard something, and realized they were footsteps from the hallway. 'Crap! I gotta get out of here before someone sees me!' he thought to himself, and made his way to the window and jumped out. and made his way down as safely and quickly as he could. Once outside, he heaved a sigh of relief, thankful that he at least hadn't been caught looking like he did. But unfortunately, his original problem hadn't been resolved, and now he had another one. What had happened to his clothes? They had been normal this morning, but they had somehow shrunk in the timeframe of when he left and now. What was he going to do?

As he stood there thinking of what else he could do, he decided it was pointless hanging around here. The question was, where could he go? He couldn't just go anywhere, since he didn't want anyone to see him like this. But then again, there was little he could do about what this situation on his own.

After school, Rangiku walked Orihime home, both still believing she was Ichigo. As soon as she was led inside, Orihime turned and asked, "What are you going to do now, Ichigo?"

Rangiku shrugged and said, "I'm thinking about heading to the Soul Society and checking things out there. I don't know why, but it feels like the right thing to do."

Orihime nodded and said, "Please be careful, Ichigo." With that, she turned around and closed the door in front of Rangiku.

Rangiku then walked toward Ichigo's home, thinking it was her residence now. As she reached the front door, Ichigo's dad dropped down and shouted, "Welcome home, Ichig--!" He didn't get the chance to finish his statement before Rangiku drove him to the ground with a kick to the head, not even taking her hands out of her pockets. "Well played, my son."

Keeping her foot firmly on his head, Rangiku said, "What the hell is wrong with you, old man? At least give a guy a chance to get settled in, won't you?" With that, Rangiku walked into the house."

"Welcome home, Ichigo!" Rangiku heard Yuzu say from the kitchen. "Dinner will be ready in about a half hour."

"Okay, I'll take a shower to unwind in the meantime," Rangiku told her new sister as she walked upstairs to the bathroom.

Once in the bathroom, Rangiku wasted no time in removing the ankle socks on her feet. Next she took her shirt off, exposing her braless boobs to the world. First checking around her desk, he didn't really find anything of interest besides some empty sake bottles. Moving on, he came to a nearby door, and opening it up, he found that it was a large walk in closet. Inside was a large amount of clothes, from standard shinigami uniforms, to kimonos, to the large amount of clothes and shoes that she had acumulated on her trips to the living world. He was about to close the closet and walk away, but for some reason, he couldn't bring himself to. He felt a bubbling urge inside him to go in and try on some of the clothes. "What the hell is wrong with me?" he questioned himself as if he had gone insane, and he thought that might be the case right now. As much as a part of him hated it, there was also a part that wanted to. He didn't know why, but there was currently a part of him admiring how nice the clothing in there was. "I can explain!" he quickly shouts, though Tatsuki doesn't break into laughter or react in a way one might expect. Instead she just tilts her head to the side.

"Explain what, hime?" she asks while looking around. "Why you are late in meeting me down the block? Don't worry about it. It isn't the first time." She grins and she motions for the door. "Come on lets go before we are late for school too."

This just leaves Ichigo more confused. Does Tatsuki really think he is Orihime? If not she is doing well at being phased by the sight of Ichigo in a girl's uniform. This also leaves him in a mind on what he should do.

"I'll be right out, I just woke up and need to finish getting ready," Ichigo said.

As Tatsuki waited outside, Ichigo hurriedly grabbed Orihime's school bag and lunch box and ran out the door. "I don't want to ruin Orihime's attendance record while I figure out what's going on," Ichigo thought as he ran to school with Tatsuki, trying not to flash his new panties on the way.

As they arrived at the front gate, Ichigo saw Orihime standing where he last remembered, but now dressed in a male school uniform that seemed tailored to fit her perfectly.

"Hey, what's up, Ichigo?" Tatsuki called out to Orihime. This got Ichigo nervous. "Great, Tatsuki even think Orihime's me. This just keeps getting better and better."

Orihime turned to respond...
12422.title: Off to School

124222.content:
Orihime blinked, cocked her head, and said to her erstwhile female friend, "But I'm not Ichigo..."

"Sure you are. Don't give me that crap." Tatsuki said in a sarcastic tone she'd never use on Orihime. However, hearing Orihime say what she did relieved him.

"That means I'm not crazy... but that also means that crazy sword has messed with reality somehow." However, Ichigo's analysis of the situation was cut short as he heard Orihime scream out. Outside, Tatsuki was giving her a noogie.

"Stop messing with me, Ichigo!! I can tell you haven't hit your head, so what's with the the weird game?" Ichigo rushes out, calling for Tatsuki, hoping to stop her.

"See, there's Orihime..." Tatsuki said. Orihime turned pale and blinked again, a little shocked by the properly fitting girl's uniform on Ichigo. "Now let's get going!! We're already late."

Ichigo leans over and whispers to Orihime, "Did she hurt you?"

"I can't believe how rough you two horseplay... I thought her knuckle was going to bore my brain out!!" she pouts.

"Well, I don't know what's going on, but earlier this morning I found a strange zanpaku-to just sitting on the sidewalk, and when it disappeared in my and, I didn't think anything of it, but then I passed out, and found myself in your apartment, dressed like you."

"Same here. I found a sword as well on my bed... Next thing I remember, I was on this corner, dressed in a boy's uniform that fit me perfectly."

"Wait, you found mysterious zanpaku-to waiting for you too?" A familiar, but out of place, voice said from out of nowhere, making Ichigo and Orihime nearly leap out of their skin.

"Is that...?"
124222.title: She is as confused as Ichigo as to what happened

choices: Everyone swapped has begun to change physically too!!
1242221.content:
"...N.. Nemu!! What are you doing here? Captain Kurotsuchi also never lets you out of his sight!!" Ichigo exclaims.

"I didn't come here by choice. This morning, after I got dressed, just before going over research data the night shift observed on ongoing projects, I found a strange zanpaku-to in the doorway leading out of my room. When I touched it, it exploded..."

"That's what happened to us..." Ichigo said, tugging on the sweater vest of the girl's uniform Orihime wore. "Judging by the clothes you're wearing, you must have switched with..." he smirked, then laughed a bit.

"What so funny, Ichigo Kurosaki?" Nemu asked.

"You switched with Uryu, and he must he going nuts right about now being you!!"

"However do you mean?" Nemu wonders, genuinely lost by that statement.

Ichigo gets a sneer and says, "Where have you been? Uryu can't stand Captain Kurotsuchi, and now he has to be his lieutenant until we can fix this."

"Should we going to your school then?" Nemu asks.

"We have to act like nothing's off for now. People will be asking enough questions as to why we aren't acting normally, but we don't need people thinking we've gone missing or ditched school. For instance, if Orihime didn't go to school as me, my dad would get a phone call asking where I'm at, and then if we fix this before nightfall, I'll have to get an earful about not skipping school, something Orihime would have done."

"But what if we cannot undo this?" Nemu retorts.

"Ugh... Listen, we're going to school. End of story. Besides, it'll allow us to see how far this strange zanpaku-to event has permeated the city, and see if anyone else we know has been switched."

"Put that way, I guess we should go to your school..." Nemu says, before digging at Uryu's pants.

"What's wrong, Nemu?" Orihime wonders.

Nemu blushed, then said, "I'm not used to wearing pants..." Ichigo and Orihime do a deadpan anime pratfall.

Later, at school, they found Ikkaku running up, trying to tear off a Karakura girl's uniform, along with Byakuya dressed like Rukia, Nanao dressed similar to Mizuiro, and Hinamori also there, but she was in a girl's uniform.

"Oh god, you found one too!! I can't stand the indignity!!" Ikkaku blubbers to Ichigo.

"Calm yourself, Ikkaku," Byakuya states. "You are making a spectacle of yourself. The humans here believe you are a girl named Mizuho, so if you are embarrassed about your manner of dress..."

"That's not it!!" Ikkaku screams. "Why did it have to be her?!"

"Alright, I recognize who each of you swapped with, based on how you dressed, but who did Momo switch with? So far whomever isdoing hass had a perverted sense of humor in swapping people of opposite genders."

"Chizuru Honshō." Hinamri said dejectedly to Ichigo, apparently aware of what kind of person Chizuru is, or at least knows of her reputation, just before Tatsuki gives Hinamori a flying kick to the face.

"You better keep your hands off of Orihime today, Chizuru!!" Tatsuki yells at her.

"But I hadn't touched her..." Hinamori mumbles, jaw swollen.

Tatsuki grins and puts her arm behind her head, "Um, sorry then... Force of habit..."

As Tatsuki backs off, embarrassed she preemptively attacked Chizuru, Ichigo went on, "How come you got a girl?"

Hinamori spat out a tooth and said, "Well, from what the others described, I seemed to have found a different color sword than everyone else. Other than that, all of the details of our stories match. We each found a sword, and next thing we knew, we had swapped with one of your classmates."

"The others should be back soon..." Byakuya says.

"Others?" Nemu asked.

Suddenly, Shinji, Isane, and Captain Komamura showed up.

"Just for the record, who did you guys swap with?" Ichigo asks.

"Mahana Natsui  ." Shinji said.

"Keigo Asano." Isane said.

"Some girl named Ryō Kunieda  ." Sajin groaned, tugging on the skirt.

"It would appear everyone else, as we figure, believes we are the people we have exchanged lives with." Isane stated.

"In that case, those people are now walking about in the Soul Society, everyone thinking they're us, all the while they're scared out of their minds." Nanao postulates.

"Well, at any rate, let's trudge through the day here, then go to Urahara's shop and see if he can help us." replied Ichigo, walking for class.

Hours later, at the shop, they go to head in, when they find Rangiku already there, dressed like...

"This is messed up!!" Ichigo yells out. "You swapped with my sister Yuzu?"

"Don't yell at me like that, Ichigo!!" barked Rangiku. "It's not like I did this on purpose, let alone choose your younger sister... Hey, what happened to Hinamori?" She pointed out Hinamori had been beaten to within an inch of her life.

Orihime was holding her up, saying, "My friend Tatsuki thought she was Chizuru, a girl that likes to grab my breasts, and beat her up every time she touched Ichigo, thinking he was me."

"Oh, so the same-old, same-old..." Rangiku said nonchalantly.

"What does that mean...?" Hinamori said out her swollen mouth.

"Um guys, can I help you with something?" Kisuke suddenly says, seemingly coming from nowhere.

"We... have a problem." Ichigo said.

After about an hour explaining everything, and Ichigo telling Urahara things only he should know, he believed them. "Well, it seems this is possibly an amazing practical, at the moment, but I'm concerned if it may have affected your reiatsu as well. I'm going to have Byakuya and Isane stay here overnight in order to do some tests. I've also had Yoruichi notify the Soul Society, and they're bringing your 'swap partners' here in order for me to better monitor them, because they're scared enough, and we don't need Mayuri scarring them for life with his 'experiments.'"

About that time, Yoruichi came through the Senkaimon with the swapped parties from the Soul Society, along with Soi Fon. Yoruichi reported to Kisuke, "After we had to explain to them about the whole Soul Society and Soul Reaper concept, we got them to tell us their side of the zanpaku-to tale, and it seems outside of the Honshō girl, everyone's stories are all the same; they found a strange sword with a violet handle and a Moebius Strip (an infinity symbol) shaped tsuba. The Honshō girl and Lieutenant Momo however claim they found a gold sword resembling Tensa Zangetsu with a gold blade."

"It was decided those that currently as students should keep playing their roles for now, to keep from ruining their lives, and somehow I got chosen to babysit you, much to my chagrin..."

"Oh come on, you'll be adorable in it..."

"I'm only going to wear it because you asked me to, Lady Yoruichi, but you know how feel about them..." Soi Fon grumbled.

"About what?" Ichigo utters.

"Skirts!! I hate them!!" Soi Fon screams out in defiance, just before Yoruichi, mouth grinning an almost Mayuri-like grin, jumps her!! "Please, no!! Not now, Lady Yoruichi!! Don't make me wear the thing now!!" she screams in the confusion, no one able to see what was going on in the dust and wrestling. However, after thirty seconds of wrangling, Yoruichi gets off of her, revealing Soi Fon dressed in a Karakura High girl's uniform similar to Orihime's, including sweater vest. Soi Fon frantically pushed the fabric of the skirt down on her groin, crossing her legs, her feet red as a beet. "I can't fight in this!! Who designs these things?!" She waddles over, legs clenched, over to a couch, whee she sits down, and quickly covers herself with a pillow.

"Now now, Soi Fon. You have to look natural, and that is the official uniform of Karakura High, so lose the pillow, or I'll make that skirt shorter." Yoruichi jests, holding some scissors.

Soi Fon, still blushing, quickly tosses the pillow out a window and sits in a more natural, but still tight legged, position on the couch. "Yes, ma'am..."

"Back to business," Urahara says, trying to remove a smirk from his face, "Everyone should head to the homes of the people they've swapped with, and keep going about like this is natural. Something like this will have to had left a major reiatsu signature, and maybe some hints on what is happening, so I hope to have some data sometime soon, possibly soon."

Everyone decided to head home.

The next morning...

124222112.content:
As Ichigo wakes up, he steps into Orihime shower and gets the shock of his life. "Where did it go!!"

Everyone frantically meets near school. Ichigo saw right away all the guys swapped with girls a couple of inches shorter, and the girls a bit taller. Also, Ikkaku had hairy legs, and now they were baby smooth. Sajin had some noticable changes, his muzzle crushed down, making his face look more human, but also feminine, and much of the fur was gone, only the fur on his head where hair would be, and on his ears, was still intact. Ikkaku had signs of a faint buzz of hair on his head.

Even if I don't turn into HER, I can hear it now, Yumichika giving me Hell, saying a bald girl just won't be treated the same as a bald guy. Fix it, Ichigo!!"

***FLASHBACK***

"Oh good!!" Soi Fon sighs with relief. "I can get out of this stupid skirt..."

"Not so fast..."

"Oh no..."

"Like I said, I just whipped them up, so I hadn't got a chance to beta test their personality stability and psychological states, meaning someone has to keep an eye on them, to make sure they don't go insane and try to kill everyone." Kisuke utters.

"I will make you pay for this..." Soi Fon exclaims, blushing.

***END FLASHBACK***


"I can't even run in this thing and not feel exposed..." she grumbles, taking out a stapler and is about to staple the skirt shut between her legs, before Yoruichi comes up and swipes the stapler, saying, "Now, follow me. Noba is around the corner to warp us to the shop."

"How convenient." Ichigo says sarcastically.

"I know!!" Orihime chirped.

At the shop, Ichigo noticed he now had little bit of a bust. Only A-cups, but still, he could tell he was gaining boobs. Once there, he saw his sister Yuzu freaking out, with Rangiku growling at her, "Get 'em back!!"

"I don't want them!! Stop shaking me!! You're making them bounce more!!" Yuzu was screaming. Ichigo's jaw dropped when he saw his sister sporting Rangiku's massive rack, but otherwise was still the same, while Rangiku was now flat as a board.

"How is that working?" he screams.

"Because Yuzu here pointed out that like Hinamori, the sword she picked up was different, and therefore the one Rangiku got was different from the normal purple handled zanpaku-to." Kisuke said, pulling Yuzu free from Rangiku's claws.

"Yeah... The sword I saw was pink, with a rainbow handle..., and a kitty on a chain attached to the handle."

"As you can tell, you're all changing."

"How can you tell?" Nanao asked.

"Well, when Byakuya and Isane began to change, it seems anyone with any even the slightest bit of reiatsu was able to see past the 'swap illusion,' and see the real person, but I still felt like I was looking at Rukia Kuchiki and Keigo Asano. Apparently, I've deduced the effects of the violet sword most of you have been affected by, and it seems it is now changing your genders to that of the people you swapped with. Boys will become girls, and girls will become boys. However, the blades that affected Rangiku & Yuzu and Hinamori and Chizuru seem special, so I'll have to monitor them to see what they'll do..."

"So what? You want us to stay here and track our changes?" Ichigo blurts out.

"You got it!!" Urahara said, "Your gigai doppelgangers should be able to cover for you, and I have Soi Fon watching them, except for Rangiku's, since she goes to a different school, so I have Ururu tailing it."

"Argh... I don't like it, but if it'll help you figure this out, I guess we should stay..." Ichigo grumbles.

Over the three days, Ichigo found himself regularly monitoring his appearance, as did everyone else. He also used soul candies to check on everyone's Soul Reaper powers. He found his height had dropped to around 5', his facial features softening into a feminine shape, looking like what he would look like if he had been born a girl, and as he figured, his chest kept growing. By the third day, his breasts her close to, but not quite, where Orihime's chest was at. His waist was narrower and hips wider, but he noticed his hair had not changed in the slightest, save for the hairline, which now reflects his now feminine gender. Orihime looked like a lightly haired man, with chiseled figures and a toned body, her face bearing bishonen good looks, accentuated by her long hair. In fact, most everyone seems to look like their opposite gender equivalent, as though they had been born the other gender, but still had their same hairstyles, but Ikkaku and Sajin had some differences, as did Ryō, the girl Sajin swapped with.

Ikkaku now stood at only 4' 9", supporting massive breasts that dwarf Rangiku's chest, and of everyone, boy or girl, had the longest, most luxurious crimson hair, draping to his knees, shimmering effortlessly in the light with nary a single split end.

Sajin now had a human face, but still sported wolf ears, but now had a wolf tail as well, and the fur on his head was replaced with long brown hair. However, he still towered over even some of the girls-turned-boys, despite losing some height.

Ryō gained Captain Komamura's wolf face and head, losing her hair in the process, and grew wolf ears of her own, becoming an anthropomorphic wolf like he was.

However, the changes that really interested Kisuke were Rangiku & Yuzu, and Hinamori & Chizuru. He noticed that outside of swapping bustlines, the only thing that changed between them was they swapped butts, giving Yuzu a ridiculously curvy figure despite not even starting puberty yet, and Rangiku moping about how she looked like a stick.

Momo & Chizuru was the most surprising, because unlike everyone else, they changed mentally, not physically. Hinamori began acting like a horny pervy lesbian, so much so she had to housed with the girls-turned-boys because she kept trying to grope the boys turning into girls and snag panty shots, only getting worse the more feminine they began to look, and Chizuru stared acting like, well... Momo.

"Well... After running some tests and analyzing the data, I have some news. First, it seems you're done changing physically. Second, it seems now, according to Soi Fon's report, that everyone remembers your swapped counterpart as looking like you do now, so for instance, everyone now remembers Orihime looking like Ichigo does now, and Ichigo looking like Orihime does now."

"That's nice, but it sounds like you have bigger news." Uryu quips, having a waifish figure not too dissimilar to his male bod, with small breasts and narrow hips, but his long smooth thighs and legs are the attention-grabbers due to wearing Nemu's outfit.

"How observant!!" smirks Kisuke. "The last bit of news I have is..."

125311.content:
Thinking back, Ichigo remembered the strange glowing sword he had found and realized that, by touching it, he was teleported to the Soul Society. In spirit form, Ichigo could have entered the Soul society with little effort, he had done so in the past but never with the aid of a sword.

"Whatever the sword was enchanted with, it had the power to force me into my spirit form." he mussed. "Having suddenly placed into such a state, I naturally came to be here."

Ichigo began to feel nervous. "I have to get that sword back if i am to return."

"You can return at any time you wish, intruder." said a small teenage girl who had suddenly entered the room.

"Who are you!?" Ichigo demanded.

"You may call me Ina." replied the girl kindly. "I am a modified soul, created to help you in what will become the next Armageddon, if we do not act fast."

"What are you talking about?" asked Ichigo.

The girl sighed. "The strange sword you found is called the soul blade, used in the last wars of the undead." she explained. "Every demon, zombie, vampire, and so on were involved."

"I never heard of such a war." said Ichigo.

The girl laughed. "That is because it occurred centuries before you were born." she said. "The last war nearly transformed every living being on the planet into wandering soul, doomed to walk the earth in limbo. It is a miserable existence, not alive but not dead, just existing with no purpose..."

Ichigo's eyes widened in utter terror. "How did the last war end?" he asked.

"With the creation of the Bounts." replied Ina with a sigh. "They were a noble group then and, in a way, they still are but time has a way of changing things."

Ichigo nodded. "What is the Soul Society asking of me?" he asked.

"There are seven weapons of the undead." replied Ina. "Anyone who collects all seven will have the power to either end the new war before it starts or rekindle it with a horrible vengeance."

"Just who is this war against?" asked Ichigo. "I'd like to know who I may be up against."

Ina gave Ichigo a sad look. "All the demons and undead fall into a free for all with themselves every few millennium." she told him. "Any undead creature you can think of will be involved." she paused, taking a breath. "The seven weapons of the undead appear, scattered across the land during these times as a means to end the war and you can believe that the Bounts are already working on collecting those weapons."

"Why?" you asked. "Let them end this war."

"Anyone who possesses all seven weapons controls all the Earth's undead, Ichigo." said Ina. "Do you really want them to have such a power?"

Ichigo shuddered of a certain death like chill. "Where do we start?"

"You will start by returning to the real world." replied Ina.

With that, Ichigo suddenly found himself back in the living world but where was he?

That was odd. He hadn't worn one of these since he quit going to his old karate lessons years ago.

As Ichigo wondered how he got here and what was going on, he was snapped out of his thoughts. "Alright, that should be enough for today!" the coach said. "You can all hit the showers!"

Everyone in the training room began to clear out and Ichigo followed with them. The members then split up by genders and headed towards the locker rooms to wash away their sweat. As he thought about what was going on, he started to follow the boys, but was quickly halted by one of the other members. "Hey, quit daydreaming and pay attention, Arisawa. You almost followed us into the wrong locker room."

Ichigo was even more confused than before. He had just been called Arisawa again, and now he was implied to have almost gone into the wrong locker room. As he reluctantly turned atround, he checked himself. He most deffinitely was not a girl, and yet here he was being told to go into their locker room.

There weren't as many female members in the club as male members, so there wasn't too many girls in the locker room. They all started to strip out of their gi, none of them seemingly alarmed by his presence, and continued what they were doing. Looking around and doing his best not to pay attention to the girls stripping around him, he found the locker labled 'Arisawa' and started to strip as well. Underneath his gi, he discovered a sports bra on his chest, and a pair of panties, and blushed harder than he already was.

Reluctantly, once he was naked he followed the other girls into the showers and washed off, repeating 'Don't look, just focus on yourself!' over and over in his head the whole time. Once he was done, he quickly made his way out of there and and back to the locker. Inside, he found a school bag and girl's school uniform. With a sigh, he resigned himself as he got dressed. People thought that he was Tatsuki, and for now at least, he would have to play along until he could figure things out.

Rukia..." Rukia is doing all she can to contain her laughter, before letting loose, but is blushing too. Even the arrancar seems to be diverting her eyes from Ichigo. "What the hell is so..."

"Your... shihaku... sho... Even Rangiku would call it... trampy!!" Rukia guffawed.

Ichigo looked down and splurted blood at the sight of his own body. His boobs were now bigger than Orihime's and Isane's put together, covered only in a tiny white bikini top, nothing else on the top half of his torso, wearing gloves that reminded him of the X-shaped wrapping of his normal bankai up to his forearms, but on his feet were black four inch heeled platform knee-high boots instead of the normal waraji, and he swore the hem of that miniskirt was now an inch shorter, only coming just a little past his now cartoonishly plump rear.

"One, I think my shihakusho in this body is based on Chizuru's psyche. Two, if so, Chizuru needs help. And three, HOW THE HELL AM I SUPPOSED TO FIGHT IN THIS!!" Ichigo yells out.

The arrancar makes the first move, firing a cero, but Ichigo easily snuffs it out in his hand. He slashes the breastplate in half, exposing the arrancar's chest to the world. Embarrassed as can be, she stops her attack, when suddenly, Ichigo feels a strange surge in his reishi when he saw her chest. It was nearly on par with his Final Getsuga.

"Where... where did her reishi go..." the arrancar screamed in terror, no longer feeling Ichigo's power on this plane. Even Rukia was dumbfounded, never experiencing this before.

"What is going on, Ichigo?" In a panic, the arrancar summons hollows on an unprecedented scale to attack. All of a sudden, Ichigo flash steps behind the arrancar, presses his massive chest to her back, holds her in her arms, holding a burning Tensa Zengetsu in front of them and turns them around, mashing his sword into her breasts. As Rukia saw them turn, it seemed Ichigo's eyes had gone blank, mouth drooling.

"Let go... of me!!" the arrancar tried to resist, but her boobs bouncing on his wrists only seems to enhance Ichigo's reishi.

His hair grew long long, then turned black, and then he said in a slutty voice Chizuru reserved for her pervy antics with girls, "Mugetsu." A massive black wave swallowed the sky, blotting out the sun. As crickets started to chirp and birds chirps in confusion from the sudden darkness, hollows by the tens of millions were vaporized. The black wave seeped into the gargantas before they could close and began massacring even more hollows on the other side until they exploded from the energy overload.

As the blackness faded, Ichigo released the arrancar, his hair returning to Chizuru's normal style. "That was... amazing... I was able to use my Final Getsuga abilities again, but this time without risking my powers... But how did I do it?"

The arrancar holds her shirt closed, exclaiming, "Alright!! I'll be good!! I won't hurt humans anymore!! I'll join the Soul Society!! I'll do anything you say... I.... I'll even be your lover... Just, please don't kill me!!" She was bowing frenetically at Ichigo's feet.

"Are you serious?" Rukia says to her sarcastically.

"I saw that power!! I heard of it!! It was just like the power that beat Aizen-sama!! There's no way I'd ever compete with that, and I'd rather repent and be a good girl than guy for some Soul Society traitor that never really cared for us..."

Ichigo sighs and says, "Oh, alright. I'll let you live!! Just don't be lying, or you'll regret it!!"

She salutes Ichigo, letting her buttonless shirt fly open in breeze, making Ichigo spew blood from his nose as she says, "Yes, ma'am!! For now on, I dedicate myself to the betterment of humans, and anything you ask of me!!" She vanishes in a sonido.

"Are you sure letting her go was a good idea?" Rukia asked Ichigo.

"She knew she was beat, and I can tell she meant it in her voice. Now I just have to explain to explain not only why I look like Chizuru, but now have my own arrancar minion."

As they began back, Rukia said, "Ichigo... back there, your eyes blanked out... What happened..."

"I remember using my Final Getsuga Tensho again, but my reishi is perfectly intact. I can still feel Zangetsu in me and everything, but I didn't feel that transcendent reishi surge through me until I saw her exposed breasts... What if I'm acquiring Chizuru's lesbian obsessions and it is having an effect on my reishi?"

"At any rate, we should get back to school before they haul your... er, Chizuru's body off to the hospital."

"Come to think of it, if I look like Chizuru, could it stand to measure that Chizuru might..." Ichigo pondered allowed.

1313.content:
Ichigo continued walking to school with his trademark scowl plastered to his face when he felt a faint burning sensation on his head. Scowl deepening, he scratched his scalp and continued on. He was about to enter the school grounds when something black drooped down in between his eyes. He grabbed the offending object and gave it a firm tug, only to grunt in mild pain. He frowned and entered the school, only to go into a nearby bathroom and look in the mirror.

"Eh? What the fuck is this?!"

Suspended in his face, hanging right between his eyes, was a familiar strand of glossy black hair. He tugged at it irritably, thinking that his psycho father had played a prank on him, but it didn't budge. He turned the faucet and wet his hand with water and ran it through his hair. He was not surprised when the black didn't come out, what he was surprised to see were the numerous streaks of the same black that began to peak through his hair. And right before his eyes, his orange locks began to vanish as each strand began to darken.

'W-what is this?"

His hair began to weave down the sides of his head, the spikes flattening and smoothing out. And slowly, as the hair grew and darkened more and more, he began to see elements of a distinctly familiar hairstyle take shape. When it reached the base of his neck, it fanned out slightly. He knew that hair, it was Rukia's!

"What the hell is happening to me?!"

What changes next?

135332222221.content:
As the mysterious zanpakuto disappeared, Ichigo was left to wonder what the heck was up with it.

"That's odd. What kind of zanpakuto just disappears like that?" he asked himself.

That being said, he didn't have much time to walk around. He had school after all to go to. He was already a bit late after examining the sword. He began to walk down the sidewalk towards Karakura High School. However, as he walked, he began to feel a bit strange, as if he was starting to feel "crammed" or something like that. He looked down at his body and didn't see much wrong. However, when he looked back up, and saw a couple of girls walking by, he almost gasped.

They were almost taller than he was!

"What?!" he asked himself as he looked around. By comparison, he was hardly as tall as he usually was, considering that he was one of the taller males in the school. He couldn't tell if he was younger or anything, but it did feel weird.

"What is going on here?" he asked himself.

Before he could figure that out, he felt shifting along his school uniform. Ducking off to the side a bit, his white shirt began to conform closer to his body, keeping its white color. However, the neckline and hem of the sleeves began to form rings of dark red around them. The neckline itself then plunged into a little triangle shape. Ichigo thought that the shirt looked familiar, but he didn't get much time to think before the next change.

At once, his pant leggings began to merge together, trying to form a single skirt as they began to rise up his legs. As the leggings formed into a single skirt that went to his knees, it retained its brown color, with a couple of red rings around the middle of it. His white socks grew up on his legs, going to near his knees as they turned darker. His school shoes even shifted, turning white and becoming a normal pair of sneakers for a girl.

"Wait a second. These clothes look familiar." said Ichigo.

However, it was only the beginning, as Ichigo's body continued to feel smaller and smaller.
135332222221.title: Yuzu

1353322222211.content:
Ichigo then thought it'd be best to see just how far his body had changed. Even if he couldn't understand whatever was going on, he knew something was changing him and he at least needed to know what first. Before long, he managed to a window at a dress store and was able to see himself at least a little bit more clearly.

"Holy crap! I look like a eleven year old!" he shouted in a prepubesent voice at his reflection. Some of the people walking by thought it was a tiny bit weird, but though it'd be best to leave the young boy alone.

"I'm almost as short as my sisters! Wait... These are Yuzu's clothes! Am I turning into her?" His bright orange hair becoming a ligh shade of brown before his eyes all but confirmed his theory. What could this be happening?

"Wait, that zanpaktou from earlier. That's what's probably causing this. But where is it now?!" Come to think of it, he wasn't even sure if it existed anymore. Still, it was his only lead. He had to find it!

So, Ichigo decided to skip school and focus more on the problem at hand. He figured the best place to start was where he first saw it. Though, he had to hurry. The more he walked, the more his hair straightened and lengthened. Before long, it managed to grow down his neck and light brown bangs got in the way of his eyes. Luckily, Yuzu's signature hairclip helped some of that problem. That is, while still aiding in the larger problem.

"Where the hell is it?!" he screamed in his little sister's high voice. "Dammit! Maybe I just need to get home. Yeah, home sounds nice right now."

With that in mind, he started dashing towards the Kurosaki Clinic. Again, each step accelerated the transformation process. His now young figure started to develop small yet noticeable curves and anything resembling muscle or body hair was drained from his body.

'Well,' Ichigo thought to himself. 'Looks like the worst is yet to come.'
1353322222211.title: The little sister

13533222222111.content:
Ichigo opened the door to the Kurosaki Clinic, catching his breath as he did. School was the furthest thing from his mind now as he walked in normally.

"Well to now?" he asked himself, his voice fully sounding like Yuzu's now. He then had a thought. If he was becoming her, perhaps he should check out her room. That might be a good idea. Following that, Ichigo put his backpack down and began running upstairs. As he did, he felt his face shifting, causing him to stop and put his smaller hands on his face. He felt his face softening, with not many other distinguishable features forming. He took a quick detour at the top of the stairs, running into the bathroom. There he ran in and looked in the mirror, seeing Yuzu's exact face looking at him.

"Oh my god." he said.

Right after that, he felt a little pressure in his groin, feeling what was happening next. It didn't take long as he felt his manhood slip away underneath the skirt, completing his change into his little sister.

"Why did this happen? What did that zanpakuto do?" Ichigo asked.

"Yuzu! Are you ready?" Ichigo heard his dad boom through the house.

"Ready for what?!" Ichigo cried back.

"For our annual trip what else? Now hurry up!" shouted Isshin.

Ichigo hardly ever heard his dad yell like that, outside of their annual cemetery trip. Wait, was that today? Boy, he must have lost track somewhere down the line.

Entering Yuzu's room, well his now, he looked around the room, deciding that he might as well go along with it for now. He found Yuzu's usual green jacket with a skirt and yellow socks. It was one of her classic outfits anyway. Besides, it was chilly out there.

"Might as well." Ichigo groaned as he got ready, not particularly happy at the thought of changing in his sister's body. He did wonder though. Where was the real Yuzu if he was here?
13533222222111.title: Arriving at the clinic

135332222221111.content:
Ichigo had to admit, it would be very awkward, not to mention embarrassing, to have to dress himself up while he was his own little sister. He was his own little sister. He was his own little sister. The sheer horror and oddity of the situation was just starting to set in for him.

There were so many questions he wanted answers to, yet he knew there really couldn't be any he could be given. Nothing much to do but go along with the situation. Assuming Yuzu didn't show up. Or was he Yuzu? Like, the only Yuzu. In fact, was there even an Ichigo anymore?

"Yuzu, hurry up!" a deep voice said while knocking on his (her?) door. Well, that was definitely his own voice. Conclusion: he was THE Yuzu. Fan-freakin'-tastic. Well, probably best just to put on the jacket and head out to save time and embarrassment. Lord knows he's had enough of that today.

"Well, let's go," Ichigo Yuzu said to her entire family while trying to force her usual smile. If Ichigo wanted to figure out what was going on, he had to keep the act as his own sister for now.

"Finally," Karin groaned.

"Yeah, about time," the new Ichigo groaned also. "Where were you earlier?"

"Oh, you know. Just taking a walk," the new Yuzu smiled. Well, they seemed convinced.

"Okaaay! Let's roll out!" Isshin exclaimed while leading the way out. Yuzu still couldn't believe it was the anniversary of their mother's death already. Wasn't it only August?
135332222221111.title: After getting ready

1353322222211112.content:
The Kurosaki family, if not a bit different, walked the short distance to the cemetery. It felt weird for the new Yuzu to be walking alongside her sister. That being said, seeing himself from this height was even weirder.

"Am I really that quiet?" she muttered to herself, seeing as how Ichigo hadn't spoken at all since they started walking.

This had just been a whirlwind of events for the new Yuzu. She began to even wonder about Zangetsu. If she was Yuzu now, what had happened to her Soul Reaper powers. She hadn't quite felt the same since.

"What are you thinking about Yuzu?" asked Karin, a lightly worried look on her face.

"O-Oh, I'm fine. Just thinking." laughed Yuzu a bit.

"I see. Well okay." said Karin a little skeptically.

After a while, they ended up at the cemetery.

"Alright, who wants to race to the top?! Ready, GO!" yelled Isshin as he suddenly began running, much to the exasperation of the rest of the family.

"Why can't he just act normal for one trip?" asked Ichigo with a groan.

"Probably will never happen." said Karin.

Yuzu laughed to herself a bit, although she kind of wondered where that feeling came from. She hoped that she wasn't becoming exactly like Yuzu. That would be weird as well.

However, right afterwards, Yuzu felt a spiritual pressure nearby. She could tell who it probably was.

"So Rukia's here as well? Isn't this just like last time?" she asked.

Suddenly, a large feeling of dread flowed over Yuzu.
1353322222211112.title: At the site

13533222222111121.content:
Meanwhile, just out of view, an eerie figure watched over the family. It hadn't sensed a pressence this unique in quite a while. In fact, it felt strangely familiar. Wait, hadn't it seen that boy somewhere before?
****
As soon as the family arrived at the gravesite, everyone started to pay their respects. Yuzu felt an extra need to considering the series of events the day had given her. She had to admit, she hadn't felt this vulnerable in a while, but now it felt more wrong than usual. She felt like she had to to keep her emotions in check, or else she'd be acting too...girly.

Not that Yuzu thought that having such strong emotions was girly, it was that she usually had them in check. She had accepted her mom's death at the last visit, especially after avenging her death. Still, that was when she was Ichigo and had power. Before she was standing right next to her former body.

'Wow, Ichigo, er, I'm looking rather hard right now,' Yuzu thought to herself while looking at her older brother. 'Wow, I'm my own big brother. Isn't that confusing.' Still, she couldn't get over how different this Ichigo looked. He almost looked angry at himself still. 'Maybe this Ichigo doesn't know about mom.'

She looked at the forest surrounding the cemetary and noticed Rukia motioning to come by some bushes. At first he thought that she was motioning towards Ichigo, but he didn't seem to notice.

"Yuzu, can I talk to you?" Rukia whispered from the bushes. Wait, why would Rukia want Yuzu? Wait, why was Rukia in a gigai? Wait, why was she wearing the same dress as the last visit?! Okay, something was definitely wrong here.

Still, Yuzu didn't have much of a choice. Whatever the hell was going on, Rukia would probably be the closest thing to a lead he could get.
13533222222111121.title: Watching...

135332222221111211.content:
"I'm glad to see you here Yuzu." said Rukia.

"Why's that? Why do you want to talk to me?" asked Yuzu.

"Now's not the time for this. We've got a huge problem."

"What problem?" asked Yuzu.

"Haven't you sensed it yet? I've been sensing a Hollow around here for some time." said Rukia.

"Again, why are you asking me? Isn't that something for me....I mean, Ichigo?" Yuzu tried to cover her little slip-up. Rukia gave her a confused look.

"What do you mean? Why would I ask your brother? You're the Soul Reaper here, not him."

Yuzu's mouth dropped at that comment. SHE was the Soul Reaper now? How in the world does that even work?

"Anyway, enough of that, I've been looking back at when you told me about your mom, and now I think I have an answer. I think a Hollow killed her, specifically this one." said Rukia.

"Um, you already told me that a long time ago. Didn't Grand Fisher die?" asked Yuzu.

"Huh? How did you know his name already?" asked Rukia.

Yuzu felt like she had a huge headache coming on. Nothing made sense anymore. This looked earily familiar to the Grand Fisher incident last time, and this time, she was just a little girl.

Just great.
135332222221111211.title: Talking to Rukia

1353322222211112111.content:
"Yuzu, you still there?" Rukia asked while waving her hand in front of a gaping Yuzu. Rukia sighed. "I didn't want to do this." She then proceeded to hit her friend over the forehead.

"The hell was that for?!" Yuzu shouted up at her partner. Funny, even in this world she was stuck with Rukia. Except now, he had to look up to talk to her. When she did, Rukia was looking surprised at her.

"Wow, I don't think I've ever heard you swear before, Yuzu."

Yuzu blinked. "Sorry, I don't know what came over me," she chuckled. "Just a little stressed, that's all." Since Rukia didn't know what was going on, that made one more person he had to fake this to. "So... How about that Hollow? We should probably go get it."

"Right," her taller partner agreed while pulling out a piece of Soul Candy and throwing it to Yuzu. She proceeded to eat it and was immediately ejected from her own body. The only thing Yuzu could think that was stranger than talking to her old body was seeing her own little body in Soul Reaper mode. She even had a zanpaktou. It was definitely smaller than Zangetsu was at the time, but it was still there. Who knew what this zanpaktou could be?

"AHHH!" cried a high voice from near the gravesite. This was followed by another shout of "Karin!" from a much deeper voice.

'Perfect,' Yuzu thought to herself. 'Now I have to save myself from a Hollow. I don't think this Ichigo could fight off a small Hollow, much less the Grand Fisher. Hopefully this Yuzu can.'

"Chappy!" she heard Rukia call over to her ejected body. Wait, so now Rukia's stupid bunny Soul Candy was her substitute? Well, that's one of the lesser surprises of today. "As soon as we take care of the Hollow, make sure to bring Karin and Ichigo to safety, okay?"

"Yes, sir!" the Soul Candy responded before hopping away to wait until her masters took care of the Hollow.

"All right, let's head out," Rukia said.

"Right." And with that, they headed towards the Grand Fisher. Again, in Yuzu's case.
1353322222211112111.title: Complications

13533222222111121112.content:
"It's over here!"

Rukia lead Yuzu along the pathway. She couldn't see either Ichigo or Karin along the way, but knew that they were nearby.

"You think you can fight against it? This will be the hardest Hollow yet, for many reasons." said Rukia.

"O-Oh, I think I can handle it." Yuzu sheepishly smiled. Doing that felt so weird. Ichigo hardly ever smiled at a moment like this, making Yuzu wonder about how she was acting. However, there was no time to worry about that. The dense spiritual pressure caused by Grand Fisher was just ahead. Yuzu just hoped that it would turn out better this time.

"Okay, here goes nothing." said Yuzu as she drew Zangetsu. Strangely enough though, she couldn't really feel Zangetsu all that well. It kind of felt like back when Ichigo was first learning how to use Zangetsu. Not only that, this version of Zangetsu looked more like a conventional sword, rather than the huge one Ichigo used to wear due to his uncontrolled energy.

"Well, look who it is." a disembodied voice boomed out. Yuzu took a step back as the familiar shape of Grand Fisher rose before her, as frightening as ever. Yuzu didn't know how to react. It was one thing when she fought him as Ichigo, because he was there when their mother, Masaki, died. Yuzu wasn't there, making this kind of strange. Never the less, she steeled herself and tried to look fight ready.

"Heh heh heh, more souls for the taking I see." Grand Fisher laughed at the little girl. Yuzu gritted her teeth a bit; the last thing she, whether as Ichigo or Yuzu, liked was being looked down on.

"Hah!" Yuzu charged forward, trying to strike Grand Fisher. However, the Hollow flash-stepped away, appearing behind Yuzu and slapping her down from behind. Yuzu fell face-first, thankfully still holding on to her sword.

"Augh, that hurt." she groaned. Injuries seemed to hurt a little more now. Apparently, the difference between a high school boy and an elementary school girl was large. Still, she got back to her feet and turned to the Hollow again. Not being able to feel Zangetsu wasn't making this any easier.

"Zangetsu, if you're in there, I could use your help." said Yuzu. No answer.

"What's wrong girly? Having trouble?" Grand Fisher laughed at her. Yuzu gritted again, deciding to charge again.

"You shouldn't keep charging! It's not going to do much good!" Rukia tried to warn.

"Too late" grinned Grand Fisher.

As Yuzu charged, Grand Fisher grabbed her in one hand, slamming her on the ground hard, making her cry out in pain from the impact. Yuzu was barely holding on to consciousness right now. The Hollow was even more overpowering in this body.

"Come...on....get....up." she groaned as she fought to stay awake. However, that feeling was waning as her eyes began to feel heavy. Grand Fisher began to approach, and Yuzu fell into unconsciousness.
13533222222111121112.title: It's hard for Yuzu

135332222221111211121.content:
Yuzu awoke to somewhere much different immediately after. Considering past experiences, she expected this to be her inner world. Everything pointed to that, considering she remembered blacking out and was currently looking at the sky while standing perfectly straight. However, instead of a sideways city, she was currently on a sideways forest fullof bright flowers. That was new. Not to mention, old man Zangetsu couldn't be found anywhere.

"Zangetsu!" Yuzu yelled to the scenery, causing a large echo. "Zangetsu, where are you?!" This question was met by a hard slap on the back of her head.

"The hell that was that?!" the girl cried out.

"Well, it's about time you got here, Yuzy," a voice resembling a young girl's called out from the trees. This was then met with an unexpected headbutt to Yuzu's stomach. After some momentary disorientation, she was finally able to see the source of the attacks: a girl that barely looked older than herself with platinum hair and a purple jacket above a white, frilly skirt. Also of notice were the purple boots this girl wore, since Yuzu got a good look at them after getting kicked in the face with them.

http://ib1.keep4u.ru/b/070716/de794004c3...

"OW! WHAT THE FREAKIN' HELL?! Who are you anyway and what are you doing in my inner world?"

"Wow, you really are off, Yuzy," the mystery girl taunted. "I expected more from the girl who used to be Ichigo Kurosaki himself."

"Wait, what?! You know I'm Ichigo?" Maybe this was finally his chance at solving everything! "How do you know who I really am?"

"What is this, twenty questions?" the girl mocked. "Seriously, I think I've counted seven already. Got to admit, that is a pretty good start. Though, I can only answer one at a time. So, I'll start with the first one, to which the answer is 'here'."

"The hell is that supposed to mean?"

"You asked where Zangetsu was, so I answered 'here'. Seems pretty straightforward."

"Of course he's here. I just wanna know where he is!" Yuzu was practically steaming by now.

"Man you just have to have everything spelt out for you, don't you? This is your inner world, where a soul can communicate with parts of their spirit. And I'm pretty sure I'm not an inner hollow."

"Wait," Yuzu stammered. "Are you saying you're...No. No, no, no, NO! Don't tell me you're..."

"That's right!" the girl said proudly. "Zangetsu, the Slaying Moon, in the spiritual flesh!"

Yuzu was speechless. She had come to accept some of the wierder things today. Transformation, time travel, alternate reality, Soul Reaper Yuzu. But this was by far the most disturbing. Zangetsu was now a little girl that was playing games with her. No stranger fact had ever been known to her. This was completely out of the blue.

"Wait, even if you are old man Zangetsu, how do you know who I really am?"
135332222221111211121.title: Inner World

1353322222211112111211.content:
"And that's now eight questions. Which one do you want first?" Zangetsu smirked. Yuzu put her hands over her eyes. One thing was certainly the same; this Zangetsu beat around the bush as much as the old man.

"Tell. Me. Why. You're. Here." Yuzu emphasized every word in that sentence. Zangetsu just smirked before jumping on to a tree branch, swinging her legs back in forth.

"Ha ha ha ha! Okay okay, let's just calm down and handle this like civilized people." Zangetsu giggled. "I suppose, first and foremost, as your zanpakuto spirit, it wouldn't' be very sporting for me not to know about you."

"But how can you know about me? Everything recently has been topsy-turvy." said Yuzu.

"Well, of course. What do you think happened? After all, you just fainted fighting Grand Fisher again." smiled Zangetsu.

"Well....I had assumed some kind of combination between time travel and some alternate reality." said Yuzu. Zangetsu clapped her little hands.

"You're definitely right on the alternate reality part, because that's exactly what this is. This is an entirely different dimension, one where Yuzu became a Substitute Soul Reaper instead of Ichigo Kurosaki."

"How does that even happen?" asked Yuzu. "Yuzu could barely even see spirits where I came from."

"That's kind of hard to explain. Anyway, Yuzu is the Soul Reaper here. Understand that much?" asked Zangetsu. Yuzu nodded, although a bit hesitantly.

"So, why am I here? You know that I'm Ichigo Kurosaki, but why am I here in some alternate universe. And if Yuzu is the real Soul Reaper here, why isn't she here?" asked Yuzu. Zangetsu suddenly hardened her gaze a bit, surprising Yuzu that a stern look could come from the little girl.

"Because this world's Yuzu....is dead."

Yuzu gasped at those words. Yuzu was dead in this world? How could that be? No one noticed anything strange. If Yuzu was dead, wouldn't they have noticed that?

"Because," Zangetsu started. "You may or may not know, but there was a near collision of worlds some time ago. Specifically, between Soul Society and the World of the Living. Like I said, you probably don't remember, but trust me, it happened." she giggled.

Yuzu raised an eyebrow but didn't say anything.

"That near collision was so huge that other dimensions were affected by it as well. The Yuzu of this world was caught up and that, and died during a pivotal moment." explained Zangetsu. Yuzu gasped a bit after hearing that. She didn't want to believe it, but Zangetsu seemed dead serious about it.

"I had to find some replacement, so I sent the special zanpakuto to another dimension that had a Half-Human/Half-Soul Reaper that could become her. Well, that and because it was fun." she cheekily grinned. Yuzu got mad at that comment.

"So you whisked my away from my dimension? Why about my friends back home?!" asked Yuzu.

"Oh, don't worry. I think another you has appeared there. I don't know. I'm on an expert." Zangetsu smilled as she flipped and landed on the ground. "So that's the facts. Your world will be fine, and this world needs Yuzu, and so do I."

"Well what can I do? I can't fight like Yuzu. I don't even know how to fight like this." said Yuzu a little exasperated.

Zangetsu giggled again. "There is one way. Another reason why you're here. I'm going to help you fight like her."

"Really? How?" asked Yuzu.

"By becoming her."
1353322222211112111211.title: Zangetsu answers

13533222222111121112111.content:
"What do you mean 'by becoming her'?" Yuzu asked her zanpaktou.

"You'd have to forget you were ever Ichigo and be filled with the memories this world's Yuzu. My Yuzu," she solemnly added.

"What?!"

"It's the only way. I hate to ask such a sacrifice for you, Ichigo, but this universe needs Yuzu as much as your universe."

"But I already know what's going to happen! I know what happens after this!"

"Yeah, after this, you're going to get killed again because you're a teenage boy inside his little sister's body. Then, so well Rukia, then the rest of your family. So what's it going to be?"

Yuzu thought long and hard. Was her memories worth sacrificing? Well, at this rate, she was almost certaintly going to die trying to fight the least favorite of all the Hollows she'd ever fought before. Yuzu was going to die. Yuzu did die. Only he could keep Yuzu alive in this world.

"Would you hurry up?" Zangetsu asked impatiently. "There's kind of an evil clown-gerbil outside."

Yuzu couldn't help but chuckle at her zanpaktou's description of the Grand Fisher. Maybe she already had a little bit of the real Yuzu in her all this time. Well, maybe this Yuzu wasn't too different from her old self, also. No matter what, she was still her family and friends' guardian. Her universe still had their Ichigo. This universe needs their Yuzu.

"I'll do it," Yuzu said bluntly. "Bring it on."

"Cool! Thank you, Ichigo Kurosaki. We're going to have so much fun together! now!"

"Can't wait wait," Yuzu responded dryly.

"Well, time for the fun part!" Zangetsu then brought out a long Naginata from behind her back that began to glow at the blade. "Don't worry, this won't hurt at all."

"It never does," her master grinned. "Thanks, Zangetsu."

"Thank you, Yuzu Kurosaki," Zangetsu smiled back. "Just keep my name in mind even after everything changes. You'll probably need it to fight Scruffy Butt out there."

"I didn't need shikai last time."

"I know, but imagine how much cooler you'd be with it! Go make Rukia jealous." She then proceeded to jab the glowing blade right into her wielder's forhead.
13533222222111121112111.title: The Needed Power

135332222221111211121111.content:
Yuzu suddenly fell into a dreamlike state and could only stare up at the sideways sky while her entire life was flashing before her eyes. Well, Ichigo's life, anyway.

Playing with a younger Karin and Yuzu, karate lessons as a child, his mom dying in his arms, his first meeting with Rukia, becoming a Soul Reaper, all the acinine things that happened after that, everything. Especially how much things escalated after the Grand Fisher, who used be her hardest opponet. She sure was going to have a lot on her plate.

One by one, certain memories started to disappear like a burning piece of film. Soon enough, Yuzu had no memory of anything beyond her latest trip to her mother's gravesite. Just as soon, she couldn't remember the first four years of her life, or at least Ichigo's. It was then that these memories started to change rapidly.

Ichigo's fourth birthday became little more than a subconscious memory and most of the two years following that became a blur, though she did remember playing with her younger brother and twin sister. These memories became consistantly clearer as Yuzu's memories became more vivid. By the time she was remembering when she was five, they became crystal clear. She recalled her mother's death, but forgot what it was like being there when she died. Any feeling of anger at herself for the death was replaced with pure sadness and the need to feel a void in her family.

This was followed by a great knowledge of how to cook and clean and anything to keep her family together, even basic medical proceedures. She rembered tiny details like everyone's birthdays, favorite foods, how to read emotions, knowing what buttons to push with certain people at certain times, and which to never push.

These were memories and feelings any Yuzu would have no matter the universe, but with one small difference: for as long as she could remember, Yuzu could see ghosts. She wasn't sure how, but it was a definite fact. Her twin, Karin could see them a little, but always denied their existance. Her brother, Ichigo, could only see faint signs of them, though he could barely see them.

And, of course, she started to remember the events of barely a month ago.
****
"You must take my zanpakuto and run it through the centre of your being, so that I may pour my powers into you. I can't gurantee you will live, but if it doesn't work, it won't matter," the beaten up raven haired girl said to her.

"Then give it here," Yuzu responded with a rare look of intensity on her face while accepting the blade. "I sure hope this better works, Ms. Soul Reaper."

"My name is Rukia. Rukia Kachiki."

"And I'm Yuzu Kurosaki. I hope we can talk again after this. If either of us can still talk, that is." Even while stabbing herself and receiving great power, Yuzu couldn't help but smile.
****
"You ready?" Zangetsu asked while snapping her wielder out of her trance.

"Yes, ma'am, Ms. Zangetsu," Yuzu smiled. "Let's teach that fuzzy monster a lesson in hurting my family."

"That's the spirit, Yuzy! Congratualations on learning my name, by the way."

"Thanks for helping me remember it."
135332222221111211121111.title: Clean Slate

1353322222211112111211111.content:
Rukia walked back a bit as the Grand Fisher stomped on Yuzu.

"Too bad. It wasn't even a challenge. Oh well. Down the hatch!" laughed Grand Fisher as he began to converge on Yuzu.

"Oh no, Yuzu!" cried Rukia. This couldn't be happening. Yuzu was going to die, and she couldn't do anything to help.

Suddenly, Yuzu's body began to glow, her yellow aura began to erupt as Grand Fisher got off her.

"W-What the hell is this?!" roared Grand Fisher. Just as suddenly, Yuzu began to move, slowly pushing herself off the ground. As she staggered to her feet, she glared at Grand Fisher.

"You've hurt my family too much! I won't let you get away with killing anyone else!" she cried as she brought out Zangetsu again. Grand Fisher just laughed.

"Ha ha ha ha! What can a little girl like you do? I'll kill you, just as I do your mother, and the same thing I'll do to everyone else here!" he roared. Yuzu just gave a sweet smile.

"Sorry mister, but that's not happening." she said as her yellow spiritual energy spiked again. She concentrated her energy on her sword, hearing it speak again.

"You ready Ms. Zangetsu!"

"Just say the word!"

Smiling at her zanpakuto's confirmation, Yuzu gripped her sword with both of her hands.

"Jump, Zangetsu!"

Zangetsu glowed as yellow as her spiritual energy, beginning to elongate as Yuzu began to twirl it above her like a baton. The more she twirled, the longer it seemed to get until the energy vanished, revealing a long naginata weapon. The long handle was light purple, like Zangetsu's clothes in the inner world, the blade seemingly brimming with power.

Rukia gasped as she looked. When did Yuzu learn her zanpakuto's shikai?

"Grrrrr, it doesn't matter what fancy tricks you have! I'll still eat you!" he roared as he began to charge once again. He lunged at Yuzu, who casually jumped away at the attack. Angered, Grand Fisher lunged over and over again, failing to land any blows on Yuzu.

"Curse you, damn brat!"

"You know, that's really bad language. You should go better." spoke Yuzu with an authoritative tone. Angered even more, Grand Fisher continued to attack. Just as he lunged, Yuzu used her sword to jump into the air, coming down with a deep slash through Grand Fisher's side.

"AHHHHHHHHHH!" the beast roared in agony. Still focused, Yuzu began twirling her sword again above and behind her, as yellow energy began to build inside. Soon enough, the blade of the weapon was fully charged.

"All right, time to put this to rest for good."

"Ready when you are!"

"Getsuga Tensho!"

One last thrust of the pole weapon unleashed a wave of yellow energy, slashing straight through Grand Fisher's mask. In utter disbelief, the hollow thrashed in anger at the girl as it slowly crumbled into dust, ending the threat once and for all.

Exhausted, Yuzu collapsed to the ground, catching her breath.

"Ms. Zangetsu, we did it!" she cheered.

"Excellent! Freakazoid is gone for good. And that technique was super awesome!" cheered Zangetsu as she reverted back to sword form. Yuzu giggled along with her zanpakuto.

"Thanks for everything Ms. Zangetsu. You've done so much for me." said Yuzu with a grateful smile.

"Hey, no problem. I live for this kind of stuff. Oh, and I think Rukia's going to want to question you. Bye!" cheered Zangetsu as Yuzu felt the spirit get away from her a bit as Rukia approched.

"Yuzu....that was....amazing. When did you learn your shikai?!" asked Rukia, almost sounding like a proud mother.

"Just now actually. Everything just seemed to come at once. Ms. Zangetsu was very cooperative." smiled Yuzu.

"Ms. Zangetsu. I hope the sword isn't making you call her that." sighed Rukia.

"Oh no, that's just me!" smiled Yuzu as the girls enjoyed a brief laugh.

*****

"I hope you're watching mom." prayed Yuzu at the gravestone of Masaki Kurosaki.

"Wierd, did something just happen? I feel like I missed something." said Karin.

"Yeah, me too." said Ichigo.

"Oh, I'm sure it's nothing. Now let's go home. I gotta start on dinner." said Yuzu with a cherry smile.

"Sure. Come on dad, stop smoking and let's go!" called Karin to Isshin, who was indeed smoking one cigarette.

"Dad, you promised not to smoke anymore!" chided Yuzu.

"Oh, it's only one, and I only do it on this day. Sue me." laughed Isshin.

The whole family just groaned, but Yuzu was in a really good mood, so she let it slide. She felt like she had a boatload of things on her mind recently, but now everything seemed natural.

And she could only wonder what was in store for her future.

1353322222222222212221.content:
Ichigo didn't seem to mind too much as the zanpakuto he found had vanished.

"Well, that's pretty weird." he said to himself. Then again, his life by default was weird; being a Soul Reaper and all that. Then again, he was just glad that he had a break from that stuff for a while. Hollows hadn't been as common as of late, and he enjoyed the peace and quiet for once.

"Anyway, better get to school." he muttered as he kept walking, slightly adjusting his white school shirt.

Anyway, as he walked along, he couldn't stop thinking about that sword. As much as he didn't want to think about it, it kept coming up during the long walk to Karakura High School. What kind of zanpakuto disappears upon contact like that? Did it go back to its owner or something? Oh well, perhaps he could mention it to Rukia later or something like that. However, as he walked along, something odd seemed to come to mind.

"Oh hey Ichigo." Mizuiro had passed by him, and Ichigo had noticed something from that. Mizuiro was a bit shorter than Ichigo, but he was slowly starting to look bigger in Ichigo's eyes.

"Huh?" he asked himself. He briefly looked around, seeing some other girls walking by. Ichigo was a bit surprised to see that he was close to about eye-to-eye with them, when he was normally much taller than them. He briefly looked at his body, which looked normal except for the height thing.

"Am I hallucinating?" he asked himself. He certainly wasn't prone to being insane, given his line of work and all that. However, he wasn't sure what kind of work made him perceive himself as being much shorter. Orihime would probably be as tall as him if this was true.

"Maybe I could just get to school and calm down. Perhaps I have been a bit overworked with school." he muttered as he kept walking. However, as he kept walking, he couldn't notice his frame beginning to thin out beneath his uniform.
1353322222222222212221.title: Yes

13533222222222222122211.content:
Trying to put whatever he was thinking about behind him, Ichigo kept walking to school. He hadn't met anyone else he knew along the way, to which he was kind of grateful for. He wasn't much in the mood to talk when his mind was occupied.

Still, as he passed more girls along the way, he continually noticed that he was eye level with almost all of them, almost making him feel small in comparison to the men. That was bizarre for Ichigo, who was pretty tall for a guy normally.

However, the school appearing within his field of vision got his mind off it.

"Can't believe I'm actually looking forward to class, but if it'll get my mind off of this crap, then by all means." he muttered as he soon walked up the steps to the school. Getting everything all prepped, he opened his locker, got what he needed, and then began walking to class.

"ICHIGO!"

Speak of the devil....

Keigo jumped behind Ichigo, to which the soul reaper just replied with a backward fist to his face as per usual. The redhead collapsed to the ground in a heap.

"Will you just stop doing that?" asked Ichigo in annoyance. However, Keigo got right up and gave a surprised look.

"Hey man, are you alright? That punch didn't feel nearly as hard as you normally do it. You need to work out more." laughed Keigo, as if being punched was absolutely fine with him now. After Keigo walked away, Ichigo took a look at his hand, to which he tensed a bit.

"Huh? What the hell?" he asked.

His hand looked a bit smaller. Actually, ALL of him looked a bit smaller. It wasn't just his height, which seemed unchanged from earlier, but his body build didn't seem to fill out as much as usual. His hands especially looked smaller and....actually a bit softer too.

"Okay, I am losing it." he groaned to himself. However, the school bell soon rang, getting Ichigo's mind off of it and sending him running towards class. As he ran though, he didn't notice stands of dark hair beginning to form from his scalp.
13533222222222222122211.title: Arrival at the school

choices: Investigating where he got the sword
135332222222222221222111.content:
When Ichigo finally got to his classroom, he noticed Orihime and Tatuski having a little conversation and decided to see if they saw anything wrong with him. However, his question basically answered itself as soon as he got closer to the two girls. He had to actually look up to Orihime!

"The hell is going on here!" he shouted to no one in particular. He might as well have shouted it to everyone, since it certaintly gained all of his classmates' attention.

"Something wrong, Ichigo?" Orihime asked worryingly. This was followed by a quick gasp as she noticed she was looking down at him. Ichigo used to be a good seven inches taller than her, but now he looked about three inches shorter. In fact, his hair seemed to have strays of dark hair. Honestly, she couldn't think of doing anything to do but drag Ichigo to the hallway to cause a little bit less of a scene. So, she did. In fact, it was rather easy. Ichigo seemed noticablely lighter as well.

Convenient. Strange if not downright disturbing, but neat.

"Ichigo, what's going on with your...." The Inoue girl couldn't think of enough words to describe the situation, so she just signaled Ichigo's entire body. His short, hairless, almost dainty body.

"I don't know, Orihime," he answered with a cracking voice. Great, now even his voice was embarrassing. "I was just walking over to school and started shrinking. Either I'm going through reverse puberty or something's up."

"Is that it?"

Ichigo thought a little bit about what else happened before he started changing. "Well... Yuzu made breakfast as usual, checked my phone for messages, got dressed, headed out, found a zanpaktou that...vanished into thin air..."

"You think that might be why you're-"

"Most likely, yes," Ichigo answered before Orihime could even get her question out. "Dammit, I have to get a way to stop this, now!"

"I say, your head's looking a little...curved."

"What?! Ah, hell! Orihime, I have to go find out what's wrong with me. I'm putting you in charge of keeping Kon under control." With that said, he popped in his Soul Candy and ejected into Soul Reaper mode before jumping out the nearest window.
135332222222222221222111.title: To class

choices: He makes it to the bridge on time
1353322222222222212221112.content:
Ichigo shunpoed over to the exact spot where he found the strange zanpaktou hoping to find some clues as to his transformation. Further investigation proved that there was nothing to investigate. There was nothing. Zelch. Nada.

"Dammit! Nothing's here!" Ichigo couldn't help but shout. Even as he did, he noticed his voice sounded higher than usual, at least by a pitch. "Maybe somebody in Soul Society is responsible for this." Well, it was the only thing he had close to a lead. So, he drew out his cell phone that had been updated to communicate with Soul Society and dialed Rukia's number. Perhaps she could shed light on the situation. Somehow.

"Hello?" the female Soul Reaper answered after a short dial tone. "Ichigo, what's wrong?"

"Something's wrong. Very wrong," he answered with his voice cracking up still.

"Hahaha! What's wrong with your your voice, Ichigo?"

"That's the thing. Somehow, I've only become five feet tall, my muscles are disappearing, and my hair is dark now. Honestly, I think I'm starting to look more like a girl. That, or Hanatarou. Either way, it's not a good position."

"Impossible. What could have caused you to change like that?"

"Well, there was this zanpaktou I found laying on the ground that later vanished into thin air, so that may be related."

"I'd have to see you for myself to confirm. This better not be a prank, Ichigo."

"I assure you it isn't. Now hurry up! My hair's starting to grow down to my back! It feels weird."

"Okay, I'm on my way. Just meet me by the bridge in a couple minutes."

"Okay, see you then." They both hung up, leaving Ichigo to run over to the Karakura Bridge as fast as possible with his newly elongated hair to rush in the wind.

"I really hope she knows something," he said to himself with an extremely girly voice that managed to stay melodious through the fright.
1353322222222222212221112.title: Investigating where he got the sword

13533222222222222122211121.content:
Even with all the thoughts on his mind, Ichigo made his way towards the bridge that was discussed. However, he couldn't see Rukia as he began to get closer.

"Guess it'll take her a while." said Ichigo.

Anyway, as he was about to land, he began to feel some itchiness on his chest. He briefly looked down, seeing that his nipples looked a bit bigger and that underneath, they were beginning to swell up.

"Oh come on." groaned Ichigo. It was beginning to be pretty obvious what was coming.

With that said, Ichigo landed on the bridge, thankful that no normal citizens could see him like this. As a minute passed, he felt the pressure in his chest building. He hugged himself a bit, as if trying to hold it in. However, it didn't help at all, as he saw breasts beginning to poke through his Soul Reaper outfit a bit. They weren't really big, like Rangiku or anything, but they were definitely there. The lack of a bra really felt weird to him.

"This is crazy." groaned Ichigo as he waited.

However, as he stayed there, he soon felt a squirming feeling in his face. He groaned in discomfort as he put his hands to his face. In his hands, he could feel his face starting to get softer, and more petite from the feel of it. He jumped down to the river below, putting his hands down as he looked in the reflection. He gasped as he saw his features soften, his eyes becoming a different color as his face completely reshaped itself. It began to look similar to someone he might have seen at one point or another, but he wasn't too sure.

"What else could go wrong?" he asked himself, his hand going to his mouth as his voice was now completely melodious.
13533222222222222122211121.title: He makes it to the bridge on time

135332222222222221222111211.content:
Right as Ichigo thought things couldn't get anymore embarrassing, he started to feel a strong gust of wind as a Senkaimon appeared. Perfect. With Rukia, it'd finally be more than just self depreciation. He let out one big groan of displeasure that gradually turned to a moan as he felt something slip. Yep, Ichigo couldn't deny it anymore. He was a girl.

"Ichigo, what's wr-" Rukia blinked a little bit before the spiritual door behind her closed. "Oh! Liutenant Hinamori. Didn't know you were here in Karakura."

"Liutenenant Hinamori? Who the hell is that?" Ichigo asked in said liutenant's exact voice.

"Is this some type of joke? Wait... Did Ichigo set you up to this?!" Her face turned into a glare.

"What? No, I am Ichigo, whether my body reflects that or not."

"Very funny, Liutenant, but I know this has to be some sort of prank. Let me guess, Renji's on it, too."

"No, no! Rukia, this isn't some joke! I AM ICHIGO!"

This does worry Ichigo. Does this mean his soul is becoming that of Tsunade at that, but just at a slower rate? It might mean at least even if his body fully changes he has some time since it seems for the most part his soul is still physically that of his old self. "That means I might have time to figure this out, but I gotta hurry." he mutters to himself then looks to his mostly female body that Kon is now inhabiting.

1513312221111211112211122.content:
He left Kon there in the alleyway, slightly confused as to what just happened. He would no doubt start to explore the new body he was inhabiting and come to a nasty surprise when he discovered the body was not 'all' female. Ichigo shuddered at the thought. He couldn't help but wonder how Kon even got there. But time was running out, he had to run and find this sword to undo the damage that had been done.

Running as fast as he could in the heels, Ichigo made his way to the main street once again. Kon didn't have the sword on him so he'd have to find places to look around this village, the most probable place would be a weapon shop. Being a spirit and thus unseeable by the common people, Ichigo couldn't just ask for directions either. He started to wander around frantically, annoyed by the lack of comfort of his outfit.

There was something Ichigo did not know about his new spirit form, however. His spirit could no longer be considered that of a soul reapers, it was more of a normal soul if anything. But the power of the sword he had touched did alter the makeup of his soul. This created a unique power that Ichigo was not fully aware of yet.

If his soul were to collide with a physical body, it would enter that body and Ichigo would be able to possess the original owner. The process would not be unlike how Soul Candy ejected the eater's soul and replaced it with a mod soul, except the victim's soul would not be ejected more so suppressed.

Unfortunately, Ichigo did not know this as he traveled recklessly through crowds of capable bodies that he could get sucked into.

"Ah hah! A weapons shop!" He shouted, spying the sign above the crowds.

It just so happened that at this particular weapons shop Team Seven was wrapping up their last mission of the day, cleaning and maintaining the many wares it had to offer. They were just on their way out the door at the same time Ichigo came charging in.

He ran face first into...
