151331222111121112.content:
After nearly colliding with a woman Ichigo somehow recognized as Shizune, he, or rather, she stopped and began to catch her breath. Shizune was a tall and slender woman with short black hair and dark eyes, wearing a traditional Japanese dress which Ichigo guessed was the professional dress for the office. She looked at Ichigo and sighed. "I was hoping to get here before you arrived... Ichigo." quietly, she said. "I would imagine your transformation and arrival was a bit unnerving."

"You- You know who I am, or was..." stunned, Ichigo asked.

Shizune nodded. "I am the only one who knows." pulling Ichigo into an empty room, she replied. "It was the order of our Hokage, Tsunade, whom you are now... for a while."

"Okay... then you can tell me why I was transformed and summoned to this place!" annoyed, Ichigo said. "There must be a reason!"

"Actually, you were not the first choice." sternly, Shizune snapped back. "Tsunade was originally hoping for Rukia Kuchiki, a real warrior."

Ichigo snorted. "If you say so." bluntly, he said. "So what happened?"

"Obviously, the sword, enhanced with the transformation and summoning spell, was somehow sent to you." huffing, Shizune replied. "Personally, I don't think any man can handle being a woman but we're stuck with you until Tsunade's mission in your world comes to a close."

"And just what is her mission?" crossing her arms, Ichigo asked.

"To stop a psychotic villain known as Orochimaru." shuddering slightly, Shizune replied. "He has traveled to your world to learn combat techniques that are unknown to this world." she then forced herself to relax. "We need you to teach us the techniques of your world so we will be better ready in case Tsunade fails."

How does Ichigo react?

15133122222222121.content:
Ichigo rolled his eyes when he saw the sword he just picked up was gone, before he could think about who would prank him like this, everything went dark. But just because it went dark did not mean he wasn't conscious, it felt like his mind was being dragged through a rusty, old pipe that was too small. Each second added to a growing migraine until Ichigo was able to open his eyes.

What Ichigo saw though, was something very different than what he expected to see. He expected to see the same path that he took to school that morning, or maybe an enemy, even a random soul reaper. But this was very different. A sewer. A dirty, rusted, run down sewer with bars just ahead of him.

Growling with anger, something that Ichigo did not realize at the moment, he ran forward towards the bars, feeling strange while he ran, but not knowing why. Once Ichigo made it to the bars, he charged right into them, expecting to break them with his reiatsu. But to Ichigo's surprise, the bars held firm and even hurt him when he crashed into them more than they should.

Ichigo looked down in frustration, only to gasp at what he saw. For in the reflection of the water below him, he saw a big fox that was looking right back at him with wide eyes. Ichigo yelped and jumped back, only to see a few giant tails as he did so. Ichigo spun around, catching glimpses of his new body, and getting a sinking feeling in his stomach as he looked at his reflection again.

Ichigo spoke to himself, "This can't be real."

After sometime, that could have been hours or minutes passed, Ichigo stood up on four legs and walked towards the bars again, hoping to see something that could explain this. But, as Ichigo got up, he noticed that something felt very strange on the lower half of his body. So, with two hind legs pushed closer together, he found out what it was.

Ichigo's roar of anger woke up a sleeping Naruto.

15133122222222121121.content:
Naruto jumped up with a yelp at the sound of a ferocious roar. The young boy let out a sigh of relief, and lied back down, when nothing scary popped out at him, only to start freaking out when he realized that he had no idea where he was and that it looked like a really poorly maintained sewer.

But the sound of someone shouting, "Why the hell am I a girl fox?! What the hell is going on here?! I mean seriously-"

Naruto stood up, making a face when he realized that the back of his pajamas were soaked with the water now, and started walking towards the sound of the voice, curious as to what a lot of the words meant as old man Hokage called them 'grown up words' when he asked what they meant before. Soon enough, he saw a gigantic fox marching back and forth in a really big cage while talking aloud.

It took Naruto a few moments to realize that the fox was the one speaking, "WHAT THE HELL?!"

Ichigo stopped talking and turned his/her head to see who spoke. Upon seeing Naruto, Ichigo barked out, "Oi, kid. What are you doing here?"

Naruto, not wanting to look scared, walked forward, "The name's Naruto Uzumaki! Remember it, fox!"

Ichigo roared, "DON'T CALL ME THAT!"

Naruto fell down from the strength of the roar alone and was staring at the vixen with fear on his face. Ichigo, feeling bad for scaring Naruto, sighed, "Sorry, kid. It's just...I was a high school teenage boy just a few hours ago, and now I'm a gigantic female fox with no idea where I am!"

Ichigo let his/her body fall down in resignation at the last word.

Naruto's eyes widened as he guessed what was going on, "I know what's going on!"

Ichigo's eyes widened and turned all of his/her attention to the short boy, Naruto continued, "Eight years ago, a giant fox attacked the village, but the Hokage killed it, right?"

Ichigo opened his/her mouth to say that he had no idea what Naruto was talking about, but the boy continued before he/she could say anything, "What if that fox wasn't killed, but was slowly coming back to life, and...and you!"

Naruto pointed at the visibly confused vixen now, "You must have gotten sucked in or something and your mind took over the kyuubi's while it was weakened. You're a hero! You saved the village without even knowing it!"

Ichigo wanted to correct Naruto, he/she truly did, but Ichigo also didn't want to crush the look of pure joy on Naruto's face for 'figuring it out,' so instead replied with, "I guess that's possible, but how do you know that I'm not the fox that attacked eight years ago?"

Naruto snorted, "I'm a great judge of character, I can just tell."

Ichigo wanted to smack him on the head for being so naive, but refrained because he/she wasn't entirely what was going on, and that this kid might be his/her only company for awhile now.

While Ichigo was lost in thought, coming up with his/her own theories, Naruto went into Ichigo's cage, and pet one of the vixen's front legs. Ichigo jumped back at the feeling, and Naruto said in a smug voice, "See? If you really were that fox, you would have crushed me!"

Ichigo's eye twitched, and returned to his/her slumped position, trying to ignore Naruto's laughter.

15233222222221.content:
Along the way to school, Ichigo Kurosaki was carrying on his usual routine, when an unknown hollow reiatsu filled the air. It was so dense, tears were forming in the air. Suddenly, Ichigo could see translucent images of people walking about, doing various things, but they didn't look like wholes. "What the hell is going on..." These people were of various level of transparency, some passing through one another, but what really shocked Ichigo was that he saw at least 60+ incarnations of the same people doing different things, and their numbers were growing. Out of nowhere, a catgirl in a pink dress showed up, fighting a horned elephantine monstrosity. Both were transparent too. He couldn't hear what she was saying, but knew she was talking, then pulled out some kind of heart-shaped item with a gold bell on it from a bell tied to her tail. Behind her, a garganta was opening. A voice said, "Excellent, the walls separating the many possibilities of the multiverse are falling apart. Reality will be mine..."

"My cue!!" Ichigo went to use his substitute soul reaper badge, when it struck the bell of the heart shaped weapon the catgirl had as she ran through him as it touched him. To his surprise, it resonated with the bell, ringing, then unleashing vast reiatsu discharges. The voice said, "Damn!! There was unknown energy spike before the realities merged. The energy is unstable now!! I have to abort..." Ichigo's vision blanked out.

When he awoke, he was on the street, but he noticed he was still standing, like he never fell down when he passed out. A female voice he never heard before yelled at him, "What's your problem, Ichigo?! Finish the chimera anima already!!"

Ichigo blinks slowly, looking around, then sees the strange monstrosity from before, the one that catgirl was fighting, throwing an innocent bystander with its trunk, then charging right for him. "I don't know what you're talking about, but if you mean stop that, I'm all for it!!" Ichigo stands his ground and grabs the monster's tusks, and manages to grind the beast's blitz to a halt next to a giant fountain. "Whoa, when did Ichigo get that strong?" another unfamiliar voice said to him. Looking to his right, he saw a blue-haired girl in a blue minidress, sleevelets, garter belt, and ankle boots, but on her back were tiny black bird wings and and plume of tailfeathers rested above her butt. Next to her was a little extremely blonde-haired girl, maybe Yuzu's age, Ichigo figured, wearing a short-legged yellow leotard with puffy sleevelets on her arms, yellow leggings on her shins, mocassins on her feet, and fingerless furry gloves, but she also had furry monkey ears and a monkey's tail curled up behind her. However, most shocking was when Ichigo saw his own reflection in running water from the fountain they were next to. He was looking back at the catgirl from before... The catgirl was HIS reflection!! "What the hell!!" He thought about it, then yelled, "The hollow!!" Forgetting about the beast before him, it swatted him away with its trunk.

"Hollow? What's Ichigo going on about?" the blue haired birdgirl said. In the sky, a humanoid figure popped up. Ichigo saw the was a brown-haired pointy-eared boy... well he thinks he's a boy, because the twin pigtails do seem goofy on a boy, as well as the loose red rest tied with the black ribbon, wearing black shorts. "Met your match yet, 'granny' Ichigo?" Ichigo was confused. He knew the body was in couldn't be no older than his own... What was up with this boy...

"Ichigo, he's coming for you again!!" the monkey girl said, as the birdgirl seemed to go after the strange boy. Ichigo looked around for his weapon, or any weapon, but was at a loss. "If I just had Zangetsu, this would be a cakewalk... Wait, just like when Uruhara was training me... I'll just sense him!!" Ichigo closes his eyes to feel out for the reiatsu of Zangetsu, and feels an energy coming from the bell on this body's tail. He reaches for it and pulls out...
15233222222221.title: Kurosaki... Motomiya... both named Ichigo...

152332222222211.content:
Ichigo reaches into the tail bell, and with a deft pull, draws Zangetsu from its depths. Everyone stops in awe and surprise. "When did Ichigo get a sword?!" the monkey girl blurted. Ichigo charged at the monster, and then flash steps behind the beast, cutting the monster in its rear legs, severing its tendons. "That'll slow you... What the hell?!" He was shocked by the rapid regeneration of the creature, and at turned to swing its trunk and tusks again, and Ichigo blocks with Zangetsu. The monster quickly uses the remainder of the trunk to launch a second attack, but Ichigo flash steps back. "You're through. Getsuga..." The strange boy stared in disbelief at the glowing blue energy building on the blade, and how much power he could feel coming off of it.

"Where has Ichigo been hiding this power?"

"...Tensho!!" The zanpaku-to technique cleaves the beast, disintegrating in the process. In the reiatsu dust however was a perfectly healthy elephant. Behind it, though, a wall and several trees in a nearby park were leveled. Thoroughly scared, the boy bolstered all his strength, enough that Ichigo knew he needed to up his game. As the boy flew in with his fist drawn, screaming, "I'm not scared of you or your freaky new sword!!" Ichigo channeled his reaitsu and said, "Bankai!!" However, before Ichigo could undergo any sort of bankai transformation, another strange pointy-eared being showed up, looking closer to Ichigo's age, with lavender hair, shows up and stops the boy, telling him, "We must fall back for now and analyze this newfound power of Ichigo's." They seem to teleport away. Ichigo disperses the reaitsu and sheathes the sword back in the bandage wrapping, throwing it over his shoulder, but found that Zangetsu was much larger compared to this girl's body, so Zangetsu nearly scraped the cement. The birdgirl ran up and asked, "What was that? Getsuga Tensho? Bankai?! Where's your Strawberry Bell? Where's our Ichigo?!"

"I'd like to know that one..." Ichigo said, looking at his reflection again.

Back in Karakura Town, a different Ichigo was getting up. She looked like she did in her world, but she wasn't dressed like she was. All of a sudden, she heard a strange female voice call out to her, "Ichigo!! Ichigo!!" Before she knew what was going on, she found her, and grabbed her by her strange new black clothes. "Alright? Who are you, what did you do to Ichigo, and why are you dressed like a soul reaper, and giving off soul reaper reaitsu?"

Ichigo mumbled, "Huh, who are you? I'm just as confused!! Please don't hurt me..." She saw her reflection in a car window. She still had her ears and tail like she would as Mew Ichigo, and was wearing the tail bell she would wear as Mew Ichigo, but her hair was red like her normal human hair, the bow was black, and her clothes were some kind of pink shihakusho under a black shihakusho over a hakama tied by a pink sash, and on her feet were socks and waraji (straw sandals). On the sash is a sword with a shape similar to the Strawberry Bell on the end. "Speak now!!" the raven haired women yelled at Ichigo. However, before this woman could do anything to Ichigo, a wiry man with bluish hair and glasses stops her and says, "Rukia, stop!!" He grabs her hand and tells her, "Look at her." Ichigo was crying in fear; fear of this new place, fear of this new situation, fear of not knowing what these people will do to her. However, the man goes on, "Something says she might not be involved. Besides, her reiatsu isn't like the massive reiatsu we felt before. I think we should get her side of the story. Let's take her back to Urahara's shop with Ichigo's body." Rukia puts her down, but keeps a dirty scowl directed at Ichigo.

"Follow us." she says coldly.

At Cafe Mew Mew, Ryou is looking over Zangetsu, while Ichigo talks to the the genius and the girls, who now look completely human. "So, give it to me straight; what the hell happened to me?"

Ryou said, "I really don't know yet, but if I were to go by your fantastic story, I'd say when you went to use your 'substitute soul reaper badge' to fight this 'hollow,' it reacted with Ichigo's Strawberry Bell and tore open a wormhole that swapped your souls. I do know some good news and some bad news."

"Good news first." Ichigo asked.

"With your powers, we can neutralize the alien threat in no time, not to mention it opens up all new kinds of research opportunities..."

"That's not very good news." Ichigo exclaims.

"...and the bad?" Pudding (the blonde monkey girl from before, now all human in a yellow waitress outfit) asked.

"This Ichigo's power seems to have stabilized Ichigo's Red Data, to a fault."

"Huh?" Pudding remarks.

"Even if we get our Ichigo back, she will be permanently stuck in her Mew form for life." Everyone gasped, except Ichigo, who was a little confused.


Who do we follow now?

As Ichigo made his way to school, he was suddenly overcome with dizzyness, and began to fall into a daze as he blacked out.

----------

He suddenly came to, finding himself in a whole new location. Looking around, he found himself in the clearing of a wooded area that he didn't recognize as any of the woods around Karakura town. He then noticed his appearance with surprise. He was dressed only in a pair of red-and-white sneakers and a pair of white gloves. Ohter than that, he was buck-naked!

"What the hell!? How did I get here, and why am I dressed like this?" he questioned.

As he stood up, he tried frantically to cover as much of himself as he could with his hands; not that it helped much.

"I can't believe that I'm almost naked! Where did all of my clothes go?!?" he exclaimed to himself. Looking around the clearing, it was clear to him that his clothes where nowhere in sight.

"I'd better find my clothes before anyone sees me like this," said Ichigo. He wanted to hurry so he took off running, only to find that he was going much MUCH faster than normal! It was going so fast that he didn't really see where he was going and ended up running right into a tree next to a lake.

After getting back up (after having let out several grunts of pain) Ichigo noticed something odd in the lake. He was shocked when he saw what it was!

It was a humanoid-looking blue hedgehog-like creature! It was down in the lake looking up at him; or that's what he thought, until he noticed that the hedgehog-creature perfectly mimicked everything he did...

Somehow, even though he still looked human, his reflection had been changed into that of this hedgehog-thing!

Ichigo's scream could be heard throughout the whole forest.

Ichigo suddenly stopped in place and twitched slightly. His eyes slowly rolled back into his head as his mouth stood agape, it looked as if he was possessed. Then, with a jolt, he collapsed on the ground, not moving at all.

No one was in at his house when he arrived, not even his younger sisters. Even if there was someone there, they probably wouldn't be able to talk to Ichigo. It was like he was in some sort of trance. 1532222212221.content:
Ichigo continued on his way to school, putting the sword out of his mind completely. As he made he way, he felt a strange sensation throughout his body, but that quickly passed, so he put it out of his mind as well.

"Huh? How'd I get here?"

Ichigo stopped walking as he thought he heard something. A voice somewhere, that sounded like a child's. He looked around, but didn't see anyone else nearby, so he continued on, though he kept warry. He knew that he didn't imagine that.

"Geez, this place is weird. Did my master change things or something?"

"Theres that voice again." he said to himself. "Okay, whoever you are, show yourself!" he called.

"Huh? Who is that?" the voice questioned.

"I'm Ichigo Kurosaki? Who are you?" he said as he looked around.

"Huh? Ichigo Kurosaki? How are you hearing me? Wheres my master?"

"Master? Who is your master? What are you talking abou?"

It was then that as if out of nowhere, a tiny, glowing, young girl in black and yellow appeared floating in front of his face. Her right arm also had a large, relative to her size, stinger like weapon. he then looked arund. "Okay, this place isn't the Soul Society. And my master isn't anywhere to be seen." she commented as she kept looking around.

"What the hell?" Ichigo questioned.

"Okay, I have no idea whats going on, so explain! How'd I get here, and where is my master?"

"Uh, I have no idea. I'm just as confused as you are." he said. "Who are you?"

"Me? I'm Suzumebachi, Soi Fon's zanpakuto." she said.

"What? Zanpakuto? How did you get here?"

"I wouldn't be asking you if I knew that!" she said.

Sure enough, when he looked over his bach, he didn't see his massively sized zanpakuto wrapped in its cloth, but a much smaller sword in a sheath. "What the hell?" he questioned as he pulled it out of its sheath, holding it upside down like a dagger. "What happened to my Zangetsu?"

"Thats me that you're holding." he could here Suzumebachi say in his head.

'You're in my inner world? How did you even get there?'

"Ichigo? Stop zoning out. We'll figure out whats going on once we deal with the hollow." Rukia said, snapping him back to reality, and out of his conversation with Suzumebachi.

"Right." He said as he and Rukia head for the hollow's location.

15322222222222222.content:
Then, how about this story concept?:

As Ichigo picks up the sword, it suddenly gives off a flash of light.

Ichigo exclaims, "What the-"

As he opens his eyes from the blinding light, he's surprised to find that the sword is gone. He looks around, but sees it no where.

"That's strange.... I'd better talk to Hat-and-clogs about this later. But nothing seems out of place here at least." Ichigo scratches his head before running off, not intending to be late for school.

Elsewhere.....

Nemu is looking around frantically across the rooftops, a panicked expression on her face. "I must find that sword soon. If master Mayu- Ahh!" a snap sounds through the air as Nemu's body is suddenly wracked in pain, falling to her knees as the shadowy figure of her master walks up to her.

Mayuri seeths, "You blundering idiot!" Slaps her to the ground. "Moron!" Kicks her in the stomach. "Do you have any idea what you have done?!" He continues to kick her, barely letting her speak a word.

Nemu struggles to speak, "...Ma-Master..... I-..I hear...gah!... heard you nee-...ugh.... to tes-..... cough.... test it!...."

Mayuri stops kicking her for a moment. "To test it?! Did you not even read the notes that it won't work for a woman?!" Nemu just looks at him confused. Mayuri delivers a strong kick into her stomach, sending her flying into the roof's cement railing. Mayuri yells, "You blundering buffoon! If someone finds that before us, the Soul Society firing me will be the least of our concerns!"

Nemu weakly gets up, coughing up blood, as she gets curious, "The-Then why did you make it, Master Mayuri?"

Mayuri fumes, "I was tired of having to limit myself to such a limited amount of test subjects in our squad on my greater experiments. After the Zanpaktou incident, Muramasa's widespread capability to effect those zanpaktous around him caught my interest, and I was curious as to if I could create something to an even greater effect without his feeble limitations with different effects. I ended up succeeding beyond my wildest expectations. With that tool alone, the entire Soul Society could bow to my power alone just through threat of controlling it. But, were it to come into the hands and be absorbed into another male's hands without knowing how to control it, the results would be disasterous!"

Nemu, standing firmer, loyal still to her master, asks next, "What results, Master Mayuri? What does the sword do?"

Mayuri grumbles, "Do I have to explain EVERYTHING?" He sighs as he prepares for a lengthy speech.

Mayuri takes a breath, then explains, "That sword is absorbed into the individual's body, down to the very fabric of the soul in which one's zanpaktou spirits resides. Even they become effected from its powers, so as to prevent them from gaining control of it. It'll turn those near the user into submissive doting female servants around the users age."

Nemu interupts, "Female, sir?"

Mayuri slaps her for interfering, "Don't interupt me! ... Yes, female. It was designed for me, and I'm a male. You really think I'd accept just any loyal servants? I don't claim to succumb to such... primitive... urges as commonly as most lower lifeforms, but even I have a preference. Why else do you think I made you the way you are, you weak excuse for an experiment?"

Nemu hesitantly asks, "If I may, Master..."

Mayuri glares, but doesn't stop her.

Nemu continues, "I am born from your blood, so would that not count under inc-"

Mayuri blanches, "Incest? You actually believe in that psychological drivel? You idiot!" He slaps her again. "As if I'll let some idiotic taboo prevent my work! That sword completely ignores such things. What irks me more is that somehow naturally growing women like that lazy blonde 10th lieutenant ended up growing up better than my version of perfection that you were SUPPOSED to be.... Not this time though. And this time, I made sure that you flaws weren't included in the changes, you idiotic girl. Not only will those changed be submissive and loyal to their master, I used the so called emotion of 'love' to ensure loyalty, unlike your flawed disloyalties. And not just those facsimiles often heard of in childish stories."

Nemu raises an eyebrow, "How do you mean, Master Mayuri?"

Mayuri sighs with an aggravated sigh, too frustrated to slap her, "I'm not some incomplete buffoon to use methods that'll only result in some sex slave or giddy fan girl. Lust may indeed be involved, and they'd be sure to be turned into attractive developed women unlike that flat board girl Kuchiki. But, it is much more involved than that. Those changed will want to spend their life with the user, actually feeling.... blech... 'happy' to be with and serve the user. Just thinking of him will bring happiness, while simultaneously driving the victims to want to serve and aid him. But I'm not so blind as to make this blind them to their own health. What's the point of servants if they become useless? With this though, they won't mind sharing the user, which would have gained me an army of servants. Not even the head captain could resist its effects. But ugh... making him into a servant? It would be degrading if it didn't make the results around the user's age. And if my preferences were to change, I made it so that the user could even change the results.... but that's only in those of someone that can control it! Not even I know how suggestible the sword will be in some idiot's soul. It'd still retain its default settings, but that could change at any time by the user without the user even knowing it. We must find it before an epidemic occurs."

Nemu pauses, "But, Master Mayuri, what's to prevent us from coming under the sword's effect?"

Mayuri gasps upon realization. He hadn't realized that. "We must act fast then. If we come under its effects, we'll be too submissive and love struck to remove it before the effect becomes permanent."

Nemu asks, "Permanent? How long?"

Mayuri, "A day at most, half a day in the least if we're unlucky. But the stronger the spirit, the less time it'll take to become a permanent fixture of it. As long as it doesn't wind up in someone of captain level or higher spiritual energy, we still have at least 12 hours." Unknown to them, Ichigo sneezes as he runs to school.

The two quickly depart, still uncertain as to where to start their fervent search.

--Elsewhere--

"So, what the heck is it, old timer? Sure is breeming with power."

Two figures, one dressed in white and one in black, stand upon a world on its side, glass floor of building windows as they stare at a glowing blue katana stuck into one of the steel rafters of the building they're standing on.

"I do not know. However, we should be cautious. It could prove dangerous."

Hollow Ichigo laughs, "All the better for me! Perhaps I can use it to finally take over this weak chump."

Zangetsu stands in his way as he begins to approach the glowing sword. "I advise against it. We do not know what wielding it may do."

Hollow Ichigo just flash steps passed him. "I don't listen to our 'king'. What makes you think I'll listen to you, old man?"

Zangetsu glares at the hollow as he reaches a hand out to grab the sword. Before he can even grab it, it bursts forth with energy, enough so for Zangetsu to look away despite his dark glasses. Zangetsu hears a scream..... but, it's higher pitch than it should be. He turns to look, only for his eyes to widen and his pupils to dilate. It was good for him to be cautious after all.

Laying on the ground, sitting in pain from being blasted back, was Hollow Ichigo.... or what used to be him. In his place was now a beautiful woman, her white kimono open wide enough and tight enough to show as much cleavage as Rangiku, along with a wild spikey main of hair pulled down by gravity to the small of her back. Also, it'd seem his formerly white skin was now closer to that of a human. A pale human, sure, but closer to human none-the-less. She has a pout on her face.

"Owww.... that hurt, damn it. I was hoping this could make Ichi-king come back." She hisses at the sword as she stands up as she pouts. "I miss our master. And we still need to make him stronger. If he's gonna protect his friends, he'll need all the help he can get to bring it out. He's still so pathetically weak. Hmm.... perhaps we could train him? Then, perhaps he'd give me some 'lessons in instinct' in return." She giggles at the thought.

Zangetsu snaps out of his shock as he replies, "Do you even realize what it is you are saying? Have you taken a look at what that sword did to you?"

Hollow Ichigo looks down at herself, then looks at him confused, "What the heck are you talkin' about, old timer? I'm the same sexy self I've always been." She pushes her breasts together for emphasis.

Zangetsu calmly states, "No, you are not. It appears that blast has changed not only your body, but your mind as well. It almost sounded like you wanted to rape Ichigo."

Hollow Ichigo promptly blushes and frantically waves her hands in denial, "No, no, no! You crazy, old man? I can't force it on him." Zangetsu raises an eyebrow. "... He's the man here. He should be the one to take the lead." Zangetsu's eyes bulge at her seductive smirk. "But, though I won't force him if he doesn't want it, doesn't mean I can't give him..." she slips her kimono down to nearly bare a tit. "...plenty of suggestions. If I can convince him to 'take me', all the better. Even if I have to beg for it. Though he's the only one I'd ever do so for."

Zangetsu actually blushes at that, causing her to laugh a surprisingly melodious cackle.

Hollow Ichigo calms herself, "What's with ya? And where's your stache you always have?"

Zangetsu raises an eyebrow, "What are you talking about? I've never been able to grow a mustache in my life. I can barely grow my beard."

Hollow Ichigo suddenly has a glazed over expression and shakes her head, "Yeah, guess so. Don't know what I was thinkin'."

Zangetsu pauses. Wait. If her memories were altered. Then..... Zangetsu raises a hand, and a mirror forms from the glass they're standing on. He looks at himself. His chin is now thinner, his mustache is gone, and his beard is at least half as thick as it was before. His expression doesn't even change as he doesn't notice as the facial hair retracts right in front of his face, getting thinner by the moment.

Zangetsu calmly states, "I don't look any different than normal.... or do I?"

Hollow Ichigo pops up from behind him. "Oooo.... nice mirror. Need some beauty tips? We may lack any shopping districts here, but if you need some tips, I'm your gal."

Zangetsu looks up at her, "You said I had a mustache. Are you sure I did?"

Hollow Ichigo thinks for a moment, "I don't think so. But, I'm honestly not sure now. What's the deal, oldie? Somethin' up?"

Zangetsu raises an eyebrow at the oldie comment. "This sword is effecting us, yet from what we see outside, Ichigo and his personal mindscape are uneffected. Look at the sword."

They look toward it. At closer inspection, they see roots in the steel. An aura also covers Ichigo's mindscape. However, it's of a different type that the slowly flaming aura emitted by the sword. The flaming aura is not quite reaching the ground that the sword is stuck in, as if it were blocked.

Zangetsu curiously states, "I wonder...." He closes his eyes, using his spiritual senses to look at it. He's shocked as he turns around. There's two different auras now. One was coming from the hilt and back of the katana. It covered Ichigo's mindscape with an odd almost purple barrier. The other flaming blue aura that was coming from the sword refused to come into contact with anything covered in that aura. Himself and the hollow were not covered in it though, and the flame was extending invisibly throughout all their mindscape. And beyond.

Zangetsu's eyes snap open in panick. "This is NOT good. We need to contact Ichigo."

Hollow Ichigo suddenly gets a nervous expression. "Wait, you're gonna bring him here?"

Zangetsu looks at her plainly, "I see no other choice."

Hollow Ichigo swallows, then gets a determined look on her face. "Outta the way." She shoves Zangetsu away from the mirror. Zangetsu turns to look back and ask what she was doing, only to be surprised to see her using a beauty kit she seemed to pull out of no where in front of the mirror. Zangetsu sweatdrops, the sweat going down his now smooth cheeks, his facial hair gone.

Zangetsu asks, "Just what are you doing?"

Hollow Ichigo, "If Ichi-king's coming, I've gotta look my best. And don't you dare contact him till I'm ready, oldie! Or I'll kill ya! I gotta make myself look my best to prove to Ichi-king I'll do anythin' to help him."

Zangetsu frowns, "This is not the time for such. I'm contac-" a giant sword barely misses his face, taking some hair strands with it, having been thrown yet held back by the ribbon on the hilt, held by a now pissed off Hollow Ichigo-chan.

Hollow Ichigo hisses, "Don't make me say it again. We are waiting till I am ready, and that's final."

Zangetsu glares, but nods, not noticing his own now slimmer waist, or the fact that he's now nearing the Hollow's height, which was also apparently reduced from becoming female.

--Back in the high school--

Ichigo's moving through the halls towards his class, feeling as if something's amiss and not being able to put his finger on it.... as he completely remains oblivious to the changes going on around him.

Girl students around him are starting to grow into their outfits, them getting tight as they stare at the passing Ichigo. While the men are getting shorter and less muscular, the already skinny ones having their pants shorten and turning the color of the skirts on the girls' school uniforms. Meanwhile, the older teachers' baggy skin is getting de-aged, their hair returning to a natural hue, and the younger teachers... their outfits are becoming lighter, closer to that of the school uniform, as they begin to think they're students on a teacher internship. All the while, boxers are all but disappearing from those in range of Ichigo's new aura, becoming briefs and preparing for further changes as those around him begin to change more and more.

Unaware of the happenings around him, Ichigo reaches the classroom without incident. Whom greets him upon entering the class room?
